testimonials.review: Life has never been better after working with Micheal! I gots alll the moneys now!!
I aints bein all brokes no mo!

Berf berf! Woof woof, and a little bark bark bark! Sometimes I growl but most of the time I snort snort snort like a little pig bull. Lick the feet. Lick the feet. Give me something good to eat. Oh jeez, I almost forgot a bow wow. And for all my homies down the block, can I get a 'awoooooooo'?!
